section.subtitle: Dubai's #1 AI call center handles property inquiries, showing bookings, and lead qualification 24/7 - even when you're showing other properties.
key_benefits: Qualify leads instantly while you're in showings
Integrate with your CRM and calendar systems
Never lose another hot lead to competitors

voice_demo.title: Live Property Inquiry Demo
voice_demo.description: Real conversation with AI agent handling Dubai Marina property inquiry
voice_demo.transcript:
Caller: Hi, I'm interested in the 2-bedroom villa in Dubai Marina that's listed for AED 2.8 million. Is it still available?

AI Agent: Good evening! Yes, the stunning 2-bedroom villa in Dubai Marina is still available. It features a private balcony with marina views, premium finishes, and access to world-class amenities. Would you like to schedule a viewing? I have availability tomorrow at 2 PM or 5 PM.

Caller: The 2 PM slot works perfectly. Can you also tell me about the parking and maintenance fees?

AI Agent: Excellent! I've booked your viewing for tomorrow at 2 PM. The property includes 2 parking spaces and the monthly maintenance fee is AED 850. I'm sending you a confirmation SMS with all the details and the property manager's direct contact. See you tomorrow!

metadata.target_audience: UAE real estate agencies, property developers, real estate brokers
